title: Customized Management Competency Enhancement Program for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Mastery of foundational business administration theories and practical experience
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment emphasizing practical application through project collaboration

learning_goals: Learners can utilize a decision-making framework that incorporates adult learners' self-directedness when establishing business strategies
Learners can analyze business cases and propose action plans through 15-minute microlearning content in a mobile environment
Learners can demonstrate and be evaluated on problem-solving capabilities within organizations through team-based project execution

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
